backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access-controlled user profiles, daily orders, karigar mappings, and karigar assignments with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, and test references for two major features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
frontend/ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration defining cache rules for index.html and all other frontend assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and SheetJS script with aggressive no-cache headers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app with navigation tabs, responsive sidebar, build ID display, and tab routing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: UI dialog for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory, triggering a mutation and resetting state on success.
Exports all orders for a selected factory to HTML, showing a loading state and disabling the button when unavailable.
Groups factory orders by karigar, supports filtering and PDF export per karigar, and displays their tables.
Sidebar listing factories with order counts, allowing selection and sorting 'No Factory' last.
Displays orders in a table with selection, generic name lookup, and assignment badges for karigar and factory.
Toolbar providing search input and design-code sorting toggle.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Daily Orders upload page handling Excel parsing, validation, filtering, sorting, diagnostics, and saving to backend.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses daily-order spreadsheets or CSVs by detecting headers, extracting columns via aliases, and returning parsed orders with warnings.
Parses karigar mapping files (Excel or PDF), detecting required columns and producing normalized design-to-karigar and generic-name mappings.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/expor: Exports enriched daily orders to an Excel file using XLSX, building rows with optional karigar and generic name.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sort filtering for orders, returning filtered results and filter state setters.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML file grouping orders by karigar with generic names and triggers a download for factory-wide reports.
Creates an HTML report for a single karigarâ€™s orders, including generic names, and downloads it as an HTML file.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ge: Determines deterministic sheet read order by prioritizing sheets 1, 3, 2, then sorting remaining names alphabetically.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ka: Encodes and decodes mapping data to and from ExternalBlob, ensuring normalized design codes and required generic names.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI for uploading, validating, parsing, and saving karigar mapping files with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/us: React hook that decodes a mapping blob and returns total entry count and ordered sheet names with error handling.
frontend/src/features/order-list/compone: Component that groups orders by karigar, displays them in a table, and supports selection and Excel export per karigar.
Simple table component that lists orders with checkbox selection for bulk actions.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Displays daily orders enriched with mapping data, grouped by karigar, with date filters and diagnostic info.
frontend/src/features/order-list/useKari: Hook that decodes a mapping blob into a lookup map of design codes to karigar info, respecting sheet priority and normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to expose readiness flags and a simple refetch interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating daily orders and karigar assignments, tied to the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type declarations for XLSX library exposed on the window object.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides build timestamp utilities, formatting a readable build ID and exposing the raw timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/textNormalize.ts: Offers text normalization helpers for cleaning Excel/CSV values, standardizing headers, canonicalizing design codes, and matching header aliases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing modes and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into user-friendly messages and appends retry guidance when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and requirements for the master design upload and karigar filtering functionality.
